original_text: And Josiah gave to the people, of the flock, lambs and kids, all for the passover offerings, for all that were present, to the number of thirty thousand, and three thousand bullocks: these were of the king's substance.
korean_text: 요시야가 그 모인 모든 이를 위하여 백성들에게 자기의 소유 양 떼 중에서 어린 양과 어린 염소 삼만 마리와 수소 삼천 마리를 내어 유월절 제물로 주매

sentences.original_text: And Josiah gave to the people
of the flock, lambs and kids
sentences.korean_translation: 양 떼의 새끼 양과 염소 새끼들을

sentences.original_text: to the number of thirty thousand
these were of the king's substance
